title: FUSES
fullText:
Fuse systems used for overcurrent protection are an acceptable means of non-load break disconnecting if they have removable fusing elements, preferably with a disconnection mechanism (fuse-combination unit).
Fuses used in PV arrays shall â€”
(a) be rated for d.c. use;
(b) be rated to interrupt fault currents from the PV array, and any other connected power sources such as batteries, generators and the grid, if present; and
(c) be of an overcurrent and short circuit current protective type suitable for PV conforming to IEC 60269-6 (i.e. Type gPV).
